Title: Spartakiada
Notes: Silent propaganda piece recapping athletic competitions held in Moscow in 1928

Notes: Charlie Chan's oldest son is chosen to compete in the 1936 Summer Olympics.

Title: Olympia Part 1: Festival of Nations
Notes: Leni Reifenstahl's Nazi propaganda film chronicling the 1936 Summer Olympics

Title: Olympia Part 2: Festival of Beauty
Notes: Leni Reifenstahl's Nazi propaganda film chronicling the 1936 Summer Olympics

Title: Kings of the Olympics
Notes: An American film mostly culled from Olympia, Leni Reifenstahl's classic record of the 1936 Summer Olympics

Title: Olympia 52
Notes: French film about 1952 Summer Olympics in Helsinki, Finland.

Title: The Grand Olympics
Notes: A look back at the 1960 Summer Olympics in Rome

Title: Tokyo Olympiad
Notes: A look back at the 1964 Summer Olympics in Japan

Title: 13 jours en France
Notes: A documentary about the 1968 Winter Olympics in Grenoble.

Title: The Olympics in Mexico
Notes: A documentary highlighting the 1968 Summer Olympics in Mexico City.

Title: Visions of Eight
Notes: Eight directors' takes on 1972 Summer Olympics in Munich.

Title: White Rock
Notes: A look at 1976 Winter Olympics held in Innsbruck, Austria.

Title: A Step Away
Notes: Footage from the 1979 Pan American Games in Puerto Rico, narrated by Orson Welles.

Title: Stade 81 a.k.a. Starting Blocks
Notes: A short film documentary about the first Special Olympics.

Notes: Made for television film\/mini-series about the origins of the Modern Olympics.

Title: 16 Days of Glory
Notes: Official documentary of the 1984 Summer Olympics in Los Angeles.

Title: Dorf and the First Games of Mount Olympus
Notes: Direct-to-video short film in the Dorf series with Tim Conway. Parody of the Ancient Olympic Games.

Title: Fire, Ice and Dynamite
Notes: A Tycoon fakes his own suicide and his children and creditors must compete for his estate in a series of olympic type events.

Title: One Day in September
Notes: A documentary chronically the 1972 Summer Olympics in Munich, Germany that were interrupted when Palestinian terrorists perptrated the Munich Massacre.
